Title: Oldboy
Writer: Garon Tsuchiya (manga), Nobuaki Minegishi (manga), Mark Protosevich (screenplay)
Actors: Josh Brolin, Elizabeth Olsen, Sharlto Copley, Samuel L. Jackson
Plot: Obsessed with vengeance, a man sets out to find out why he was kidnapped and locked into solitary confinement for twenty years without reason.
